lines.text: Uncle Fritz, wake up. He is sleeping like a sack again.
[Suddenly sees Fritz on the floor, sleeping]
Fritz, what are you doing down there?
You see, tonight I heard something falling down, but I didn't realise that it was me.

[disguised as the female teacher Mrs. Darling]
Excuse me, where is the hotel management school.
Over there. I'm the principal.
So the way leads me to you.
Ziborius.
Darling.
Excuse me, do we know each other from earlier?
Unfortunately no.
But dear lady said 'Darling'.
Oh, what unfortunate missunderstanding. My dear name is 'Darling'.
Ah, Darling, the new cooking teacher. Hello. Kiss your hand. Are you doing well again?
By no means. I'm my niece. I mean my sister. I mean my sister cabled me that she is not doing well and she sent me here, because we can't leave you alone with the cooking classes.
Zipfl, has the new teacher arrived?
Pardon me, who?
The cooking teacher. The classes will began tomorrow. I don't understand. Wasn't there a phone call for me?
Not a phone, telegram.
Well?
Tomorrow.
Tomorrow? How do you know it?
Because already here.
I thought tomorrow.
Well, yesterday tomorrow.
And you want to give it to me only today, Zipfl?
Zipfl, I knew that you are simple. But you aren't simple, you are stupid.
Where is Ms. Peters?
She left that moment.
And where did she go?
Unfortunately I can't give out any information.

[puts money in an envelope]
Maybe you can give me small clue.

[takes the envelope]
Ticket to Velden.
Something else?
Not that I'm aware.

[puts more money in another envelope]
Maybe you are.

[takes the envelope]
Phone call with Velden.
Where exactly?

[gives Andy an empty envelope, Andy puts money in it and returns it, the receptionist takes it]
Hotel management school "Luculus".
Thank you.
[leaves]

[puts all three envelopes inside his jacket]
No problem, it's my job to give information.

[picks up the phone]
Hello?
[suddenly scared, puts some fabric over the phone to disguise his voice]
I told you already my uncle isn't here. What? He is dead. Away. In the puerperium.
[slams down the phone]
I tell you, this is some day today.
Next year we are going to cancel that day.
If we are going to survive it.
Why? Are you preparing a new experiment?
I have to send you dearest greetings from my sister.
Where is she? I wanted to introduce her to my mommy.
The mommy, the good mommy. How is she?
Very good. Why?
Still in Oklahoma?
Where is she?
Who? Your mommy?
No, your sister.
With the mommy.
In Oklahoma?
No, in Bielefeld, with my mommy.
But I wanted to introduce her to my mommmy. She already knows her mommy.
What about the inventions I wanted to buy?
Ah, no problem. All invetions and patents were built by me and my sister together. I am just like my ister, you can do the same thing with me.
I can't introduce you to my mommy.
Hello, I'm Busebius, race manager of...

[interrupts him]
We don't do advertisment for racing companies.
I just need Mr. Mohrenkopf.
We are an advertesment agency, not a detective office.
We found out that his nephew is in a business relationship with you.
Who is it?
A certain Andy Hart.
We'll see, if he is in a business relationship with us.

[developing and checking photos Andy secretly took of Hanna/Renate]
You see, Commercial sphings, I can always do it.
One thing you did for sure.
What is it?
To be with me in the dark room.
Ah, now I understand why it is so hot in here.

[Dressed as a woman]
Isn't this a great boat, in which Hanna is driving.
[suddenly realise Renate in front of him/her, thinking that this is Hanna]
But aren't you out there right now?
Oh auntie, auntie. You caught the Wörthersee-disease.
Not that. Browny darling, do I look sick?
Not at all, sweety.
Darling.
If you look at me like that I get weak.
Well you should drink tomorrow a MOBIS-bottle with your coffee. Makes you strong.
Where is Mohrenkopf?
Wow, you just drove round record.
His invention MOBIS3 is a panacea.
Really? That's a cathastrophy?
No, it is real luck. We are going to win the race.
No, I just fired Mohrenkopf.
You, you, you...
Idiot?
Exactly.

[Fritz opened up the oil container of a car. Oil is coming out]
What have you done again?
Don't worry, I just checked the oil.
Why? It is full.
It used to be.
We all have to do everything twice.
[kicks Fritz, he lands under a different car]
Where is the crazy guy?
I'm here, what can I do for you?
What are you doing down there?
As you told me, I'm fixing the car.
I can see that. But it's the car of the competitor, you, you, you...
Idiot?
Exactly.

[sees Andy]
There he is. I will approch him today.
Excuse me, but you are here with me.
Well, I can't really waste the whole day because of you.
